entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
